name: Syncthing
short_description: Continuous file synchronization program. It synchronizes files between two or more computers.
description: Continuous file synchronization program. It synchronizes files between two or more computers. Syncthing is a self-hosted application focused on tools, utility, storage, files. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Syncthing on your home server to continuous file synchronization program. it synchronizes files between two or more computers without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Syncthing to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
